branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1W, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>NCA1 double rod, double acting, medium duty&nbsp;NFPA interchangeable&nbsp;cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.</p>
